title: Business news live - pound rises ahead of Brexit talks as Juncker says deal is still possible
text:
The pound has risen to its highest since July against the dollar after Jean-Claude Juncker said that a Brexit deal can be done by the 31 October deadline.

The President of the European Commission told Sky News on Thursday night that "we can have a deal", sending sterling higher.

Mr Juncker said a no-deal Brexit would be "catastrophic" and that he was doing "everything to have a deal".

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Please allow a moment for the live blog to load...
